bibl.title: Epithets with the Title Despotes in Regnal Formulas in Document Dates and in the Imperial Oath.
bibl.note: Lists arranged alphabetically: Epithets in Regnal Formulas in Documents with Both Oath and Date. - Epithets in Documents with Regnal Formulas in either Oath or Date - but not Both.
PACKMAN Zola M., Epithets with the Title Despotes in Regnal Formulas in Document Dates and in the Imperial Oath.
